entry.string:
Multisites must be configured first before you can Add a site!

Please configure the master site from the menu option Multisites - Master Config.

The Master site can then return here to Add Sites.

THIS SITE IS ALREADY CONFIGURED AS THE MASTER MULTISITE SITE.

You should only make changes to this configuration, if

If the HTTP_HOST value above displays your correct domain name, you should make sure HTTP_HOST is selected from the drop down box.
If the domain name for HTTP_HOST is incorrect, only then, change the value in the drop down box to SERVER_NAME.

The Master Multisite has not yet been configured!

Please configure the Master Site from the menu option Multisites - Master Config.

You can then add new sites through the menu option Multisites - Add Sites.

Return here to View Sites once your have added sites to view!
